state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, you could, like, try to take a trip east. If you can get around to doing that, try to move east. And then, make an effort to take a trip north. And then, attempt to go west. Once you accomplish that, take a trip west. Then, make an effort to take a trip south. Then, move south. Okay, and then, travel south. Okay, and then, go west. Then, travel west. That done, make an attempt to move west. After that, make an attempt to venture north. Okay, and then, make an attempt to take a trip west. With that over with, go to the north. After that, pick up the coin from the floor of the kitchen. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Laundromat =- You find yourself in a laundromat. A normal kind of place. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Laundromat =-0/1
